creator: k.baranski@wasko.pl
text:
We are using eclipse on Windows that use Cp1250 with commit comments.
We also have Linux server with CI. When generating cvschangelog on linux we haven't found any good solution to made Ant to use Cp1250 encoding instead of UTF-8.

Preferably there should be additional attribute in cvschangelog task:
<cvschangelog ... encoding="Windows-1250"> ... </cvschangelog>
